actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend from one year to three years the period after separation from military service during which the manifestation of epilepsy will be presumed to be service-connected.

summary.text: Provides that epilepsy developing a ten percent or more degree of disability within two years after separation from active wartime service shall be presumed to be service connected for purposes of veterans' disability compensation.
